Chosen of the Storm.name: Chosen of the Storm
Chosen of the Storm.blurb: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.
Chosen of the Storm.description: Innate: When Volibear's health drops  below 30% of his maximum health he regenerates    30% of his maximum health over 6 seconds     2.5% of his maximum health every 0.5 seconds  .
Chosen of the Storm.notes:
* Chosen of the Storm's cooldown starts as soon as it activates.
 If the cooldown ends while Volibear is under 30% health Chosen of the Storm will not trigger unless he takes damage.
 If Volibear is killed directly from anywhere higher than 30% health Chosen of the Storm will not activate and therefore will not go on cooldown.

Rolling Thunder.name: Rolling Thunder
Rolling Thunder.blurb: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
Rolling Thunder.description: Active: Volibear gains  bonus movement speed for the next 4 seconds, increased when moving towards a nearby  visible enemy champion within 1800 units of him.
Rolling Thunder.description2: For the duration, Volibear's next basic attack deals  bonus physical damage and  flings his target over and behind himself.
Rolling Thunder.description3: Rolling Thunder resets Volibear's autoattack timer.
Rolling Thunder.notes:
* Rolling Thunder's bonus damage affects structures.
 Enemy can be flinged through very thin walls.
 Volibear will retain the bonus movement speed for Rolling Thunder's full duration even if he flings his target before it expires.
 When Volibear changes direction (from "towards champions" to any other direction), his bonus movement speed decays over 1 second.

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.blurb: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
Frenzy.description: Passive: Volibear's basic attacks grant  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Volibear gains the ability to cast Frenzy.
Frenzy.leveling: Bonus Attack Speed Per Stack:9 / 13 / 17 / 21 / 25%Total Bonus Attack Speed:27 / 39 / 51 / 63 / 75%
Frenzy.description2: Active: Volibear bites the target enemy, dealing physical damage, increasing by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).
Frenzy.leveling2: Minimum Physical Damage:60 / 110 / 160 / 210 / 260 (+ 15% bonus health)Maximum Physical Damage:120 / 220 / 320 / 420 / 520 (+ 30% bonus health)
Frenzy.description3: Frenzy's  cooldown is halved if it is used on a  minion or  monster.

Majestic Roar.name: Majestic Roar
Majestic Roar.blurb: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
Majestic Roar.description: Active: Volibear deals  magic damage to all nearby enemies, slightly  knocks them back and  slows them for 3 seconds. Minions and monsters are instead  feared and slowed by 100% for the same duration.
Majestic Roar.description2: Enemies who are dashing or are  airborne during Majestic Roar are dealt an additional 8% of their maximum health as magic damage.
Majestic Roar.notes:
*  Airbone can also be enemies affected by ally abilities or  Rolling Thunder.
 Majestic Roar will fear clones (e.g.  Hallucinate).

Thunder Claws.name: Thunder Claws
Thunder Claws.blurb: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
Thunder Claws.description: Active: After a 0.1 second delay, Volibear deals magic damage to up to 8 nearby enemies.
Thunder Claws.description2: Afterwards, for 12 seconds, Volibear's basic attacks deal the same damage as bonus magic damage on-hit that also bounces instantly to up to 7 nearby unaffected enemies.
Thunder Claws.notes: * Volibear slightly increases his size for the duration.
